name: Leaping Assault
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] se lanza a [TargetName], dejándolo fuera de balance.Ella aprovecha la oportunidad de envolver sus brazos delgados pero asombrosamente fuertes alrededor del cuerpo de [TargetName], sujetando sus brazos a su lado y poniéndolo a su merced.
statusMiss: [AttackerName] leaps at [TargetName], but [TargetHeOrShe] dodges at the last second, narrowly avoiding [AttackerHisOrHer] clutches!
restraintStruggle: Squirming and shoving, [ThePlayerName] does his best to shake Gren off…
restraintEscapedFail: …but for all [TargetHisOrHer] efforts, [AttackerHeOrShe] just won't let go! [TargetName] at least has the satisfaction of seeing her clench her teeth in effort behind her cocky smile.
